title: The 7th Pre-Light
description: A young Sel researcher is given the challenge to lead the analysis on a newly discovered race: Humans. They are getting closer to developing FTL technology and need to be understood before they take their first steps into the stars.A senior Sel security technician has been assigned the task to stop a serial killer. What does his case have to do with a 500-year-old secret?
author: Brett Mumford
